apiservice.name: Aesir E-Commerce - Company Webservice
apiservice.author: Aesir
apiservice.description: Maintains the companies, also known as customers or end customers, as global vendors and purchasers of the system

create.description: This operation creates a new Aesir E-Commerce Company

field.name: id
field.description: Company ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: name
field.description: Company name

field.name: name2
field.description: Company name, line 2

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: image
field.description: URL of image to import into the server for displaying for the company

field.name: parent_id
field.description:
Company parent ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: address_name1
field.description: Address name

field.name: address_name2
field.description: Address name 2

field.name: address_line1
field.description:
Actual address, first line.
This field is required for customer companies directly under the main company.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: address_line2
field.description: Actual address, second line

field.name: zip
field.description:
Address zip code.
This field is required for customer companies directly under the main company.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: city
field.description:
Address city.
This field is required for customer companies directly under the main company.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: country_code
field.description:
Address country.
This field is required for customer companies directly under the main company.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: employee_mandatory
field.description: When enabled, a final employee is required to purchase

field.name: show_stock_as
field.description: Defines how the users in this company will see the stock when shopping: «actual_stock»: show the available stock, «color_codes»: show the stock with color codes, «hide»: do not show the stock at all, «not_set»: inherit value from Customer Price Group

field.name: stockroom_verification
field.description: When set to Yes, stockroom availability will be required to purchase products by the users of this company.

field.name: contact_info
field.description: Company contact information

field.name: currency_code
field.description: Default currency for this company

field.name: order_approval
field.description: When enabled, if this company is a reseller, the orders will get expedited automatically to the company in the level above

field.name: use_wallets
field.description: Enables wallets for the users of this company, so they can use them to purchase

field.name: use_collections
field.description: Defines if collections are enabled for this company, otherwise regular shopping is displayed

field.name: language_code
field.description: Language code for the users in this company

field.name: send_mail_on_order
field.description: If enabled, this company admins will receive emails on order placing

field.name: show_retail_price
field.description: If enabled, this company will be able to see retail prices of the products while shopping

field.name: b2c
field.description: Enables the end-user functionality, on behalf of this company

field.name: customer_price_groups
field.description:
Price groups the company belongs to.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: customer_discount_groups
field.description:
Discount groups the company belongs to.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: url
field.description: Url for company use in B2C mode

field.name: show_price
field.description: Display or hide prices in shop views and other relation extensions.: «-1»: Use Global configuration «0»: Hide price, shop work as catalog. «1»: Show price.

resource.description: New company internal ID upon success, zero on error

list.description: This operation lists all Aesir E-Commerce Companies

field.name: id
field.description: Internal company ID

field.name: name
field.description: Company name

field.name: name2
field.description: Company name, line 2

field.name: parent_id
field.description: Parent internal company ID

field.name: address_name1
field.description: Address name 1

field.name: address_name2
field.description: Address name 2

field.name: address_line1
field.description: Actual address, first line

field.name: address_line2
field.description: Actual address, second line

field.name: zip
field.description: Address zip code

field.name: city
field.description: Address city

field.name: country_code
field.description: Address country

field.name: currency_code
field.description: Default currency for this company

field.name: language_code
field.description: Language code for the users in this company

field.name: b2c
field.description: Enables the end-user functionality, on behalf of this company

field.name: url
field.description: Url for company use in B2C mode

field.name: state
field.description: True if published, false if unpublished

field.name: include_images
field.description: When true, it populates the image field with the URLs of images. Otherwise, the field will remain empty.

resource.description: Other valid IDs for the company

Company image URL.
By default this field is empty, but it will populate the URL when sending filter[include_images]=true
Other valid IDs for the parent company
When enabled, a final employee is required to purchase

Defines how the users in this company will see the stock when shopping: «actual_stock»: show the available stock, «color_codes»: show the stock with color codes, «hide»: do not show the stock at all, «not_set»: inherit value from Customer Price Group
When set to Yes, stockroom availability will be required to purchase products by the users of this company.
hen enabled, if this company is a reseller, the orders will get expedited automatically to the company in the level above
Enables wallets for the users of this company, so they can use them to purchase
Defines if collections are enabled for this company, otherwise regular shopping is displayed
Language code for the users in this company]
If enabled, this company admins will receive emails on order placing
If enabled, this company will be able to see retail prices of the products while shopping
Enables the end-user functionality, on behalf of this company
Url for company use in B2C mode
True if published, false if unpublished
Start displaying from a certain item in the list
Total number of pages of items
Limit the number of listed items
Sort list by field and direction

item.description: This operation displays a single Aesir E-Commerce Company

field.name: id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Other valid IDs for the company
Other valid IDs for the parent company
When enabled, a final employee is required to purchase

Defines how the users in this company will see the stock when shopping: «actual_stock»: show the available stock, «color_codes»: show the stock with color codes, «hide»: do not show the stock at all, «not_set»: inherit value from Customer Price Group
When set to Yes, stockroom availability will be required to purchase products by the users of this company.
hen enabled, if this company is a reseller, the orders will get expedited automatically to the company in the level above
Enables wallets for the users of this company, so they can use them to purchase
Defines if collections are enabled for this company, otherwise regular shopping is displayed
Language code for the users in this company]
If enabled, this company admins will receive emails on order placing
If enabled, this company will be able to see retail prices of the products while shopping
Enables the end-user functionality, on behalf of this company
Price groups the company belongs to (internal IDs)
Price groups the company belongs to (other IDs - comma separated when multiple)
Discount groups the company belongs to (internal IDs)
Discount groups the company belongs to (other IDs - comma separated when multiple)
True if published, false if unpublished
Associated delivery addresses for this company (internal IDs)
Associated delivery addresses for this company (other IDs - comma separated when multiple)
Associated sales persons for this company (internal IDs)
Url for company use in B2C mode
Associated sales persons for this company (other IDs - comma separated when multiple)

update.description: This operation updates Aesir E-Commerce Company

field.name: id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: erp_id
field.description: Set or update the Company ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: name
field.description: Company name

field.name: name2
field.description: Company name, line 2

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: image
field.description: URL of image to import into the server for displaying for the company

field.name: address_name1
field.description: Address name

field.name: address_name2
field.description: Address name 2

field.name: address_line1
field.description: Actual address, first line

field.name: address_line2
field.description: Actual address, second line

field.name: zip
field.description: Address zip code

field.name: city
field.description: Address city

field.name: country_code
field.description: Address country

field.name: employee_mandatory
field.description: When enabled, a final employee is required to purchase

field.name: show_stock_as
field.description: Defines how the users in this company will see the stock when shopping: «actual_stock»: show the available stock, «color_codes»: show the stock with color codes, «hide»: do not show the stock at all, «not_set»: inherit value from Customer Price Group

field.name: stockroom_verification
field.description: When set to Yes, stockroom availability will be required to purchase products by the users of this company.

field.name: contact_info
field.description: Company contact information

field.name: currency_code
field.description: Default currency for this company

field.name: order_approval
field.description: When enabled, if this company is a reseller, the orders will get expedited automatically to the company in the level above

field.name: use_wallets
field.description: Enables wallets for the users of this company, so they can use them to purchase

field.name: use_collections
field.description: Defines if collections are enabled for this company, otherwise regular shopping is displayed

field.name: language_code
field.description: Language code for the users in this company

field.name: send_mail_on_order
field.description: If enabled, this company admins will receive emails on order placing

field.name: show_retail_price
field.description: If enabled, this company will be able to see retail prices of the products while shopping

field.name: b2c
field.description: Enables the end-user functionality, on behalf of this company

field.name: url
field.description: Url for company use in B2C mode

field.name: show_price
field.description: Display or hide prices in shop views and other relation extensions.: «-1»: Use Global configuration «0»: Hide price, shop work as catalog. «1»: Show price.

resource.description: Internal Company ID upon success, zero on error

delete.description: This operation deletes Aesir E-Commerce Company(ies).

field.name: id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: True on success. False on fail or error

publish.description: This task enables you to set specific Companies as published.

field.name: id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal Company ID upon success, zero on error

unpublish.description: This task enables you to set specific Companies as unpublished.

field.name: id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal Company ID upon success, zero on error

imageUpload.description: Adds or update an image for a company.

field.name: id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: image
field.description: Image (base64 encoded) to be added to this attribute value.

resource.description: Internal company ID upon success, zero on error

imageRemove.description: Removes an image from a company.

field.name: id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal company ID upon success, zero on error

Company ID.

Address ID.

pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
